common.hang_tight: Hang tight, we're working on something amazing!

welcome_screen.app_description: Draw, create, and watch your art come to life with magic!

auth.enter_email_reset: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.sign_in_subtitle: Welcome back! Sign in to continue your creative journey.
auth.sign_up_subtitle: Join NovaDraw and start creating amazing art!
auth.reset_link_sent: We've sent a password reset link to
auth.check_email: Check your email and click the link to reset your password.
auth.error_password_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.error_name_length: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth.can_now_login: Your password has been reset successfully.
auth.password_changed_message: You can now sign in with your new password.

errors.email_already_used_message: This email is already registered. Try logging in instead!
errors.login_failed_user_not_found: User not found. Create an account first!
errors.connection_problem_message: Cannot connect to the server. Please check your internet connection!
errors.taking_too_long_message: The request is taking too long. Please try again!
errors.weak_password_message: Please use a stronger password with at least 6 characters!
errors.invalid_email_message: Please enter a valid email address!
errors.account_not_found_message: No account found with this email. Try signing up!
errors.server_error_message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later!
errors.new_password_same: New password must be different from current password.
errors.reset_user_not_found: User not found. Please check your email address.
errors.invalid_reset_code: Invalid reset code. Please check and try again.
errors.reset_code_expired: Reset code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

categories.select_category: Select a category and start your creative journey!
categories.animals_description: Draw cute animals like dogs, cats, and more!
categories.objects_description: Learn to draw everyday objects and shapes!
categories.nature_description: Create beautiful nature scenes and plants!
categories.vehicles_description: Draw cars, planes, and other vehicles!

drawings.choose_what_to_draw: Choose what you want to draw from this category!

step_instructions.draw_circle_head: Draw a Circle for the Head
step_instructions.draw_circle_head_desc: Start by drawing a big circle for the head
step_instructions.add_ears_desc: Draw floppy ears on both sides of the head
step_instructions.draw_body_desc: Add an oval shape below the head for the body
step_instructions.add_legs_tail_desc: Draw four legs and a wagging tail
step_instructions.add_triangle_ears_desc: Draw pointy triangle ears on top of the head
step_instructions.draw_oval_body_desc: Add an oval shape for the body
step_instructions.add_face_details_desc: Draw eyes, nose, mouth, and whiskers
step_instructions.add_tail_fin_desc: Draw a triangle tail and top fin
step_instructions.add_fins_eye_desc: Add side fins and a big round eye
step_instructions.draw_large_circle_desc: Start with a big circle for the elephant's head
step_instructions.add_trunk_desc: Draw a long curved trunk hanging down
step_instructions.draw_large_body_desc: Add a big oval body behind the head
step_instructions.add_legs_ears_desc: Draw four thick legs and big floppy ears
step_instructions.draw_square_base_desc: Start with a square for the house base
step_instructions.add_triangle_roof_desc: Draw a triangle on top for the roof
step_instructions.add_door_windows_desc: Draw a door and windows to complete the house
step_instructions.draw_perfect_circle_desc: Draw a round circle for the ball
step_instructions.add_pattern_lines_desc: Draw curved lines to make it look like a soccer ball
step_instructions.draw_star_points_desc: Draw five points around in a circle
step_instructions.connect_star_lines_desc: Connect the points to make a star shape
step_instructions.add_sparkles_desc: Draw small sparkles around the star
step_instructions.draw_trunk_desc: Start with a tall rectangle for the tree trunk
step_instructions.add_branches_desc: Draw branches coming out from the trunk
step_instructions.add_leaves_desc: Draw a big cloud shape for the leaves
step_instructions.draw_flower_center_desc: Start with a small circle in the middle
step_instructions.add_petals_desc: Draw oval petals around the center
step_instructions.add_stem_leaves_desc: Draw a stem and small leaves
step_instructions.draw_sun_circle_desc: Draw a big circle for the sun
step_instructions.add_sun_rays_desc: Draw lines coming out like sun rays
step_instructions.draw_car_body_desc: Start with a rectangle for the car body
step_instructions.add_car_wheels_desc: Draw two circles below for wheels
step_instructions.draw_plane_body_desc: Start with an oval for the airplane body
step_instructions.add_wings_desc: Draw wings on both sides of the body
step_instructions.add_tail_propeller_desc: Add the tail and propeller to complete the plane
step_instructions.draw_apple_shape_desc: Draw a round shape with a small dent on top
step_instructions.add_apple_stem_desc: Draw a small stem and leaf on top
step_instructions.draw_triangle_slice_desc: Start with a triangle for the pizza slice
step_instructions.add_pizza_toppings_desc: Draw circles and shapes for toppings
step_instructions.add_crust_details_desc: Make the crust look thick and tasty
step_instructions.draw_princess_head_desc: Start with a circle for the princess's head
step_instructions.add_crown_desc: Draw a beautiful crown on top of her head
step_instructions.add_face_hair_desc: Draw her face and long beautiful hair
step_instructions.draw_robot_head_desc: Start with a square for the robot's head
step_instructions.add_robot_body_desc: Draw a rectangle body with arms and legs
step_instructions.add_robot_details_desc: Add buttons, lights, and robot features

upload.upload_description: Take a photo or upload your drawing and let our AI make it even more stunning!

edit_options.select_option_subtitle: Pick an amazing way to transform your drawing!

edit_options.voice_description_subtitle: Tell your story and watch the magic happen!

final_result.great_job_drawing: Great job! Your drawing looks fantastic!
final_result.save_functionality_coming: Save functionality will be implemented soon!
